label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_027
content:
## 2026-01-29 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
#### Zone Transfers
- AXFR Requests: 40
- AXFR Success Percentage: 95.0
- IXFR Requests: 230
- IXFR Success Percentage: 98.3
- Transfer Average (ms): 675
- Transfer P95 (ms): 1705
- TSIG Failures: 2

#### TTL Changes
- Records Changed: 65
- Zones Touched: 9
- TTL Minimum (s): 180
- TTL Maximum (s): 86400
- TTL Median (s): 1800
- Rollbacks: 1

#### Propagation
- Cloud Edge Sites: 36
- Propagation Average (s): 92
- Propagation P95 (s): 250
- Stale Answer Percentage: 1.0

#### DNS Queries
- QPS Average: 25700
- QPS Peak: 67200
- NX Domain Percentage: 2.3
- SERVFAIL Percentage: 0.11
- UDP Percentage: 96.0
- TCP Fallback Percentage: 1.7

#### DNSSEC
- Zones Signed: 94
- Signing Queue Depth: 4
- Signature Refreshes: 142
- DS Mismatch Count: 0
- Bogus Validation Events: 4

#### Health Checks
- Authoritative Reachability Percentage: 99.95
- SOA Serial Mismatch Count: 4
- Lame Delegation Count: 0

#### Change Management
- Change Requests: 7
- Changes Applied: 6
- Changes Failed: 1
- Mean Time to Apply (min): 31

#### Cache Behavior
- Resolver Cache Hit Percentage: 86.5
- Negative Cache Hit Percentage: 42.6
- Prefetch Enabled Percentage: 86.0

#### Latency
- Auth Response Average (ms): 20.5
- Auth Response P95 (ms): 56.2
- EDNS0 Present Percentage: 73.6

#### Errors
- Format Error Count: 16
- Refused Count: 25
- Rate Limited Count: 20
- Truncation TC Percentage: 1.0

#### Capacity
- Zones Total: 720
- Records Total: 2608800
- Dynamic Updates Per Hour: 420

#### Compliance
- Zonefile Lint Errors: 7
- DNSSEC Policy Violations: 1
- Audit Log Gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
#### bind-master-01
- CPU Percentage: 46
- Memory Percentage: 68
- Disk Used Percentage: 81
- Net In (Mbps): 120
- Net Out (Mbps): 165
- Open Files: 1468
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

#### bind-slave-02
- CPU Percentage: 34
- Memory Percentage: 59
- Disk Used Percentage: 60
- Net In (Mbps): 95
- Net Out (Mbps): 110
- Open Files: 1310
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

#### cloud-dns-sync-01
- CPU Percentage: 70
- Memory Percentage: 82
- Disk Used Percentage: 57
- Net In (Mbps): 150
- Net Out (Mbps): 195
- Queue Depth: 12
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

#### signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 54
- Memory Percentage: 81
- Disk Used Percentage: 67
- Net In (Mbps): 24
- Net Out (Mbps): 28
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 69
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Dynamic updates spiked due to a misconfigured internal client updating multiple TXT records per minute; propagation p95 rose and sync queue depth reached 12.
- One change set failed after exceeding per-zone change batch limit in provider API; split into smaller batches and re-applied.
- TSIG failures correlated with increased transfer volume; confirmed keys correct and mitigated by staggering transfers (reduced parallelism).
- Rolled back one TTL reduction (180->60) after observing increased stale answers during the update spike; restored to 1800.

### On Call
- Shift: O. Bennett
- Pages: 4
- Tickets: 10
- Status: Degraded during dynamic update spike; mitigated by batching, staggering transfers, and correcting client behavior.
